<div class="blip_description"><p>Arrived safely. in Toronto Westjet was great except for the cheesy French recordings. I'd rather hear a human being read French badly personally.  All in all very pleasant, I'll be taking Westjet again.</p><p>It feels really weird to be attending 2 Web 2.0 events (BarCamp Tdot on the weekend and DrupalCamp Toronto tomorow) that's not in Vancouver or the West Coast. Not having to show a passport is strange after attending so many Web 2.0ish type events in Portland and Seattle last year!

It feels strange but I like. it More Web 2.0 Canadian events that are not in Vancouver please! </p></div><div class="formats_available" style="margin-top: 15px">Formats available: MPEG4 Video (.mp4)
